Package Entities

Class AISnake

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Entities.Snake
Entities.AISnake
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovingEntity
public class AISnake extends Snake
The AISnake class represents an AI-controlled snake entity in the game. It extends the Snake class and adds AI behavior for calculating the next direction to move.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • AISnake

      public AISnake(Point point, SnakeColor color, Integer initialLength)
      Constructs an AISnake at the specified position with the specified color and initial length.
      Parameters:
      point - The initial position of the AISnake.
      color - The color of the AISnake.
      initialLength - The initial length of the AISnake.

  • Method Details

    • CalculateNextDirection

      public void CalculateNextDirection()
      Calculates the next direction for the AI snake to move. The AI targets the closest ScoreEntity and moves towards it. If no target is found, it moves in a random valid direction.

    • getNextDirection

      private Direction getNextDirection(Point currentPosition, Point targetPosition)
      Determines the next direction to move from the current position to the target position.
      Parameters:
      currentPosition - The current position of the AISnake.
      targetPosition - The target position of the AISnake.
      Returns:
      The next direction to move.

    • directionConstraint

      private boolean directionConstraint(Direction direction)
      Checks if the specified direction is valid for the AISnake to move.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to check.
      Returns:
      True if the direction is valid, otherwise false.
